a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Shown is the female employment-to-population ratio in 2020 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis).
The female employment-to-population ratio corresponds to the proportion of a country's female population
15+ that is employed. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations
Data source: International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
